description: This file declares the interface for the Object Array component, providing the prototypes for functions related to creating, removing, enrolling, and initializing object array components within the system. It is part of the BroadWay Service Delivery System, used for managing object arrays in the RDK platform.

methods.name: AnscCreateObjectArrayComponent
methods.description: Creates and initializes an object array component with specified container, owner, and reserved contexts.

methods.name: AnscObjectArrayCOCreate
methods.description: Creates an instance of the object array component with the provided context handles.

methods.name: AnscObjectArrayCORemove
methods.description: Removes and deallocates the specified object array component.

methods.name: AnscObjectArrayCOEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls the necessary objects within the object array component.

methods.name: AnscObjectArrayCOInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the object array component's internal state.
